archimate:Device.name: Office Laptops (OL)
archimate:Device.documentation:
Intended Use:
General administrative tasks, documentation, emails, scheduling, communication, finance, and procurement activities.
Specifications:
• Processor type: Intel core i7 and AMD Ryzen 7: heavier multitasking or future software demands. • Memory capacity: 16 GB RAM handles multiple applications, browser tabs, and remote access to hospital systems without lag. • Storage capacity: 512 GB SSD: in case documents and software applications accumulate over time. • Screen size and resolution: 14–15.6 inches, Full HD (1920 x 1080) • Battery life: Minimum 10+ hours would be ideal for shift-based use without frequent recharging. • Operating system: Windows 11 Pro • Connectivity options: Wi-Fi 6 (ensure compliance with access points), Bluetooth 5.0, Ethernet (via adapter and dock). Ensure that Ethernet adapters and docking stations are available in case of unstable Wi-Fi. • Ports and expansion slots: USB-A (x2), USB-C (x1, power delivery and video output), HDMI, SD Card reader • Graphics capabilities: Integrated graphics • Build quality and weight: Durable, business-grade construction, under 4 lbs. In addition, a MIL-STD-810G or MIL-STD-810H rated laptop could provide extra protection against drops, shocks, and spills. • Protective Equipment: Protective sleeve or rugged carrying case • Included peripherals: Mouse and Keyboard • Support & Warranty – Opt for on-site support and extended warranty (3-5 years) to ensure smooth hospital operations in case of hardware failure.
